flawed_nl_solution:
The left-hand mice cost 120*0.3=$<<120*0.3=36>>36 more than right-handed ones
So they cost 120+36=$<<120+36=151>>151
So he makes 151*25=$<<151*25=3775>>3775 a day
The store is open 7-3=<<7-3=4>>4 days a week
So in a week, he makes 3775*4=$<<3775*4=15100>>15100
#### 15100

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 156, not 151. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
